hero.desc_strong: Turn your flyers and drives into your digital space in 48 hours without touching a line of code.
hero.desc: Professionalize your personal brand: gather your bio, playlists, dates and photos into a single link that speaks for you before you hit play. Community, clarity and status in every click.

cta.title:
Your community
is waiting
cta.desc: Attract bookers, labels and fans with a presskit that speaks for you. Simplify your communication and boost your brand today.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our professional presskit service

capsules.genesis_description: The first concept ramon. A starting point. Genesis is not just a set of websites; it's the beginning of a new way to show yourself with clarity and professionalism. From scattered links to purpose-driven branding. This is where the idea of DJ Presskit was born as a community and standard.

soundcloud.text:
DJ Presskit is officially supported by SoundCloud.
A trusted partnership to elevate your music presence.
